Title: Project Manager with Experience in Roads and Infrastructure
RoleDescription: Are you ready to lead exciting infrastructure projects, and would you like to be part of a skilled interdisciplinary team where both the atmosphere and ambitions are sky-high? Then you might be the colleague we are looking for!At AFRY, we develop and provide advisory services on sustainable transport infrastructure for future generations. You will become part of an ambitious, cross-disciplinary team that takes pride in delivering functional, well-thought-out, and innovative solutions. Roads, railways, tunnels, and bridges are some of our focus areas, and our clients include Vejdirektoratet and Banedanmark.You will join our Road team in Herlev. In addition to your Danish colleagues, you will also work alongside international team members, with opportunities for collaboration and knowledge sharing.We are experiencing growth in our infrastructure projects, and we are looking for someone who wants to help shape tomorrows solutions. As a project manager with us, you will play a key role  working alongside a passionate team, youll have every opportunity to grow and create real value for society - Group Manager, Shahbaz Rasul.Job Description As a Project Manager in the Road team, you will take on a central role with broad responsibility across multiple areas, ensuring the successful execution of our projects.Specifically, you will be working on:Leading and managing complex infrastructure projects with a focus on budget, schedule, and qualityPlanning, coordinating, and providing ongoing reportingCommunicating risks and project status to stakeholders and maintaining strong internal and external relationshipsParticipating in the design phase and contributing to the professional development of your colleaguesProviding support for site supervision and construction managementParticipating in the preparation of project proposals and bids.You will become part of a professional environment focused on knowledge sharing and strong collaboration, where you will also engage in international networks of AFRY to strengthen the transport sector. Your workday will be marked by great colleagues, exciting challenges, and a high level of influence.We imagine that you will be a great fit for the role if you are ambitious about both professional and personal development, passionate about project management, and:Hold a relevant education, e.g., as an engineerHave approximately 5 years of experience in project managementPossess solid experience in the design and planning of road and infrastructure projectsHave experience with municipal and public sector projects, as well as infrastructure projects for private developersHave knowledge of road regulations and standardsCan communicate professionally in both Danish and English, with strong written and verbal communication skillsAre eager to grow both professionally and personally, and are passionate about sharing your knowledgeAdditionally, you are quality conscious, responsible, and possess strong collaboration skills.AFRY is an international engineering, design, and advisory company with 18,000 dedicated experts in infrastructure, industry, energy, and digitalization. In Denmark, we are about 850 colleagues working in construction, transport, process industry, pharmaceutical industry, automation, energy, and architecture.We are one of the largest engineering firms in the Nordics and set the framework for an attractive workplace, where there is time to develop your professional skills through a wide range of projects. We collaborate across disciplines and borders, providing ample opportunity to accelerate your career.Sparring, feedback, and teamwork are key in our daily work, where digitalization and sustainability are strategic guidelines.We strive for a friendly and inclusive culture with respect for each other. We consciously work with inclusion and diversity  with us, you can be yourself. And we love flexibility because there should be time for everything that brings value. Not only at the office but also at home with family and friends.Other benefits include:Varied and diverse tasks and projects for large and well-known private and public clientsInternal development opportunities in one of the countrys leading engineering firms.A large interdisciplinary network of competent colleagues.An attractive pension plan, secure health insurance and massage schemeFamily-friendly and flexible conditions.Lunch scheme.Active staff associations and social events.Interested?
